#### Dr. Alice Rogers <span class="person-pronouns">(she/her)</span>

![](images/alice-rogers.jpg){.person-photo .person-photo-large alt="Alice Rogers head shot"}

**Senior Lecturer in Fisheries Biology**  
**Director, Victoria University Coastal Ecology Lab**

Alice is a marine ecologist and quantitative fisheries scientist. She leads the MEEM Lab and the Coastal Ecology Lab at Victoria University of Wellington. Her research focuses on how climate change, fisheries, and other stressors impact coastal ecosystems, and how management can be improved to ensure these ecosystems survive and thrive for future generations. Alice completed her PhD at [Imperial College London](https://www.imperial.ac.uk/) in 2011, studying the population dynamics of Caribbean sea urchins. Originally from central England, she has worked and dived in the UK, Honduras, French Polynesia, Australia, and New Zealand. Alice is passionate about interdisciplinary, collaborative science and works closely with iwi, government, and community partners. She is committed to mentoring students and fostering equity and diversity in marine science. Alice's favourite fish is the harlequin sweetlips (*Plectorhinchus chaetodonoides*).

:::

```{r print-bios, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(yaml)
library(stringr)

people_files <- list.files('people', pattern = '\\.(md|qmd)$', full.names = TRUE)

render_person <- function(yaml, bio) {
  # If profile_link exists, make the name a link; otherwise, fall back to LinkedIn; otherwise, plain name
  if (!is.null(yaml$profile_link) && nzchar(yaml$profile_link)) {
    name_html <- paste0('<a href="', yaml$profile_link, '" target="_blank">', yaml$name, '</a>')
  } else if (!is.null(yaml$links$linkedin)) {
    name_html <- paste0('<a href="', yaml$links$linkedin, '" target="_blank" class="person-linkedin">', yaml$name, '</a>')
  } else {
    name_html <- yaml$name
  }
  name_and_pronouns <- paste0('<span class="person-name">', name_html, '</span>',
    if (!is.null(yaml$pronouns)) paste0('<span class="person-pronouns"> (', yaml$pronouns, ')</span>') else '')
  photo_html <- if (!is.null(yaml$photo)) paste0('<img src="', yaml$photo, '" class="person-photo" alt="', yaml$name, '">') else ''
  links_html <- ''
  if (!is.null(yaml$links)) {
    link_icons <- list(
      linkedin = '<i class="bi bi-linkedin"></i>',
      project = '<i class="bi bi-link-45deg"></i>',
      funding = '<i class="bi bi-cash"></i>'
    )
    for (type in names(yaml$links)) {
      # Don't render LinkedIn icon if name is already a link
      if (type == 'linkedin') next
      icon <- link_icons[[type]]
      url <- yaml$links[[type]]
      if (!is.null(icon) && !is.null(url)) {
        links_html <- paste0(links_html, '<a href="', url, '" target="_blank" class="person-link person-link-', type, '">', icon, '</a> ')
      }
    }
    if (links_html != '') links_html <- paste0('<div class="person-links">', links_html, '</div>')
  }
  bio_html <- paste0('<div class="person-bio">', bio, '</div>')
  return(paste0(
    '<div class="person-card-flex">',
      '<div class="person-card-header">',
        '<div class="person-name-row">', name_and_pronouns, '</div>',
      '</div>',
      '<div class="person-card-body">',
        photo_html,
        '<div class="person-card-details">',
          links_html, bio_html,
        '</div>',
      '</div>',
    '</div>'
  ))
}

any_rendered <- FALSE
for (f in people_files) {
  lines <- readLines(f, warn = FALSE)
  # Find the first YAML block (--- ... ---)
  yaml_start <- which(trimws(lines) == '---')[1]
  yaml_end <- which(trimws(lines) == '---' & seq_along(lines) > yaml_start)[1]
  if (!is.na(yaml_start) && !is.na(yaml_end) && yaml_end > yaml_start) {
    yaml_lines <- lines[(yaml_start+1):(yaml_end-1)]
    bio_lines <- lines[(yaml_end+1):length(lines)]
    yaml_obj <- yaml.load(paste(yaml_lines, collapse = '\n'))
    bio <- paste(bio_lines, collapse = '\n')
    cat(render_person(yaml_obj, bio))
    any_rendered <- TRUE
  } else {
    cat(paste0('<div class="person-error">Could not parse ', f, '</div>'))
  }
}
if (!any_rendered) cat('<div class="person-error">No valid people found.</div>')
```
